DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose of this study is to examine the effect of Pregnenolone (PREG) on the acute psychosis-like and cognitive effects of Delta-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). This will be tested by pretreating healthy individuals with PREG, and then assessing their responses to Dronabinol (THC).
DOC.brief_title: Testing the Interactive Effects of Delta-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol and Pregnenolone: Sub-Study I
DOC.criteria: Exposed to cannabis at least once in lifetime Cannabis na√Øve Individuals with a documented reaction/allergy to Pregnenolone Individuals with a documented reaction/allergy to Sesame oil
